Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm Jason, from Perth, Australia and I have recently got into KSP. I have been struggling a bit so I figured I'd post here. I can build a basic rocket and get it into orbit, I even got one into orbit of the Mun, but haven't ever landed there. I am using a Saitek X52 Flight Control System for my joystick and am working on adding my Saitek Pro Flight Rudder Pedals to it. Any tips would be very much appreciated.

Jason

I don't know whether you need tips on building or flying, but here's both: an example rocket and walkthrough instructions. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25029-A-moon-rocket-for-newbies
I need a bit of help on both. I am able to build a simple rocket to get into orbit and to the moon. But I am pretty hopeless when it comes to flying
well I cant say much but if you are running into fuel problems use the nuclear rocket it is extremely efficient in space.
